name: TransportationAccess
title: Transportation Access
description: Assessment of the patient's ability to access transportion to reach health related resources (Business ID: Entry 2729865)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Transportation Access.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an assessment of the patient's ability to access transportion to reach health related resources.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes SNOMEDCT codes for Transportation Access.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Transportation Access.)

contains.display: Current level of confidence I can use public transportation [PROMIS]
Has lack of transportation kept you from medical appointments, meetings, work, or from getting things needed for daily living
Do you have trouble finding or paying for transportation [WellRx]
